reviewText: I really enjoyed this DVD, because I've coached a basketball teams before. This will assist my for next season. Coach K does help out on what look for players & the team.  Win /lose, bad / good calls, all about making it & having fun on the courts. Be safe & have fun.
Its a good dvd, but its a copy/burn. I'm ok with that but the company should be upfront with the public about that.
Excellent resource for basketball coaches or parents who want to learn from one of the all-time greats.  Highly recommended.

Coach K gives away no "secrets, but a lot of platitudes.  The knowledge dispensed is already known to any student of the game.  In short, unless you are a rabid Duke fan, there is absolutely no point in buying this overpriced restatement of the obvious.  Save your money for another item.
